original_title: 最高の彼女と、はじめての密着囁き日帰りハメまくりデート。 天使もえ
overview: Moe Amatsuka gets featured as this dream girlfriend who is also very gentle and subservient. The story begins in the house and ends up on a date night out in a hotel room.  A full POV video that combines the experience with ASMR.
title: My Girlfriend Is The Best: Our First Overnight Date Filled With Constant, Close, Whispering Fucking: Moe Amatsuka
